com.coveros.selenified.application

Class WaitFor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coveros.selenified.application.WaitFor

  • public class WaitFor
extends Object
    WaitFor performs dynamic waits on the app in general, until a particular condition of the application is met, not one for a particular page or element. Nothing is ever returned. The default wait is 5 seconds, but can be overridden. If the condition is not met in the allotted time, still nothing is returned, but an error is logged
    Version:
    3.0.3
    Author:
    Max Saperstone
